mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter: Jane C. Washington, Blakeley, to John Augustine Washington III, 1853 January 30
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, Jane Charlotte Blackburn, 1786-1855
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Jane writes to her son about Clark Mills's proposed statue of Washington, "which our government has at this late but fortunate time, determined on having." She also asks her granddaughter Louisa to write about her acquaintance with Washington Irving. Autograph letter signed, 2 pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: John Augustine Washington III and Descendants Papers
